### Job Description
-----------------

The selected technician will be responsible for the operation and maintenance of atmospheric monitoring stations located in Egbert, Ontario. This will include:

* Regular visits to perform data monitoring, diagnostics, and minor repair of a variety of monitoring equipment.
* Sample collection and data recording
* Troubleshooting and minor repair of monitoring equipment.
* Attendance to knowledge transfer sessions with Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) technical staff.
